mapper.select: update INSBCarmodelinfo set carinfoid = #{carinfoid}, modifytime = NOW() where id = #{id}

update INSBCarmodelinfo set operator = #{operator},modifytime = NOW(),noti = #{noti},carinfoid = #{carinfoid},brandname = #{brandname},standardname = #{standardname},standardfullname = #{standardfullname},familyname = #{familyname},price = #{price},taxprice = #{taxprice},analogyprice = #{analogyprice},analogytaxprice = #{analogytaxprice},factoryname = #{factoryname},commercetype = #{commercetype},carprice = #{carprice},seat = #{seat},displacement = #{displacement},aliasname = #{aliasname},gearbox = #{gearbox},loads = #{loads},unwrtweight = #{unwrtweight},fullweight = #{fullweight},airbagnum = #{airbagnum},absflag = #{absflag},listedyear = #{listedyear},cardeploy = #{cardeploy},policycarprice = #{policycarprice},isstandardcar = #{isstandardcar},carVehicleOrigin = #{carVehicleOrigin},rbCarModelName = #{rbCarModelName},jyCarModelName = #{jyCarModelName},bwCode = #{bwCode},jyCode = #{jyCode},rbCode = #{rbCode},isRbMatch = #{isRbMatch},isJyMatch = #{isJyMatch},insuranceCode = #{insuranceCode},glassType = #{glassType},jgVehicleType = #{jgVehicleType},ratedPassengerCapacity = #{ratedPassengerCapacity},vehicleid = #{vehicleid},syvehicletypename = #{syvehicletypename},syvehicletypecode = #{syvehicletypecode} where id = #{id}

update INSBCarmodelinfo set operator = #{operator},modifytime = NOW(),standardfullname = #{standardname},carprice = #{carprice},seat = #{seat},displacement = #{displacement},unwrtweight = #{unwrtweight},fullweight = #{fullweight},listedyear = #{listedyear},isstandardcar = #{isstandardcar} where id = #{id}

select id, standardname, standardfullname, seat, displacement, unwrtweight, fullweight, listedyear,
isstandardcar, carprice from INSBCarmodelinfo
and standardfullname like CONCAT('%', #{standardfullname},'%')
order by
${sort} ${order}
standardfullname asc
limit #{offset},#{limit}
